events.message: Customer reported an auto collision involving their vehicle on March 30th, requesting claim initiation to cover damages.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident based on provided details mentioning vehicle collision with another car.
An agent was assigned to handle the claim and coordinate further communication with the customer regarding accident specifics.
Acknowledgment sent to the customer confirming receipt of the claim and assuring them of prompt assistance with their auto accident.
Requested police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair estimates to support the investigation of the auto accident claim.
Customer submitted all requested documents including the accident police report and detailed photos of the car damages.
The investigation team began reviewing submitted evidence to verify the circumstances and liability related to the car collision.
Investigation concluded confirming the accident facts and validating the extent of damages as described by the customer.
Proposal for settlement amount issued to the customer based on repair cost assessments and policy coverage limits.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement, expressing satisfaction with the communication and offer provided.
The claim was officially approved following customer agreement to the settlement terms and verification of all required documents.
Settlement payment was processed and issued to customer's designated account for vehicle repair expenses.
Claim officially closed with all processes completed and customer notified that their auto accident case is resolved.
